send_at.description: Timestamp when the email was sent.

email_dropped_count.description: Number of emails that were dropped before sending.

email_bounced_count.description: Number of emails that were not delivered due to bouncing.

email_opened_count.description: Number of times the email was opened.

email_clicked_count.description: Number of times links in the email were clicked.

email_unsubscribed_count.description: Number of recipients who unsubscribed from the emails.

email_spam_reported_count.description: Number of emails reported as spam by recipients.

email_opened_rate.description: Percentage of delivered emails that were opened.

email_clicked_rate.description: Percentage of delivered emails in which links were clicked.

email_spam_reported_rate.description: Percentage of delivered emails reported as spam.

contacts_count.description: Total number of contacts targeted in the campaign.
